required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Dose-tolerance, Pharmacokinetics and Iodine Uptake For rhTSH In Post-thyroidectomized Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I/II Clinical Trial of Dose-tolerance, Pharmacokinetics and Iodine Uptake For Recombinant Human Thyroid Stimulating Hormone In Post-thyroidectomized Patients

brief_summary.textblock: Phase I/II Clinical Trial of Dose-tolerance, Pharmacokinetics and Iodine Uptake Effects For Recombinant Human Thyroid Stimulating Hormone In Post-thyroidectomized Patients

detailed_description.textblock: This phase I/II study of rhTSH, To observe the safety and tolerability characteristics of different doses of rhTSH In Post-thyroidectomized Patients, and to observe the dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) and maximum tolerated dose (MTD).

secondary_outcome.description: area under curve of serum thyrotropin concentration
whole body radioiodine imaging after rhTSH administration and after thyroid hormone withdrawal
classification and degree of adverse events

arm_group.description: Phase 1: 0.9mgx1d、0.9mgx2d、1.8mgx1d、1.8mgx2d, intramuscularly (IM) ; Phase 2: patients will be treated at the recommended dose for phase 2(RP2D).The RP2D will be determined by the Phase 1.

intervention.intervention_name: Recombinant Human Thyroid Stimulating Hormone for Injection
intervention.description: rhTSH was dissolved in 1.2 mL of sterile water for injection to obtain a solution containing 0.9 mg/mL rhTSH.
